subject: Golf
Cerebral Palsy
lead_paragraph: D. J. Gregory, a 30-year-old man with cerebral palsy, has walked every hole of every PGA Tour event this year, including the Masters in April and the United States Open.
snippet: D. J. Gregory, a 30-year-old man with cerebral palsy, has walked every hole of every PGA Tour event this year, including the Masters in April and the United States Open.
